# Fetch some prices
```{r}
system("make")
files = list.files(path = "tmp", pattern = "*.json", full.names = TRUE)
print(files)
```

# Let's munge some JSON
```{r}
library("rjson")
raw = fromJSON(file = files[3])
summary(raw)
```

```{r}
prices = ()
for (observation in raw$Data) {
  prices = rbind.data.frame(prices, observation)
}
summary(unlist(prices$close))

plot(prices$time, prices$close)
```
# Volume
```{r}
plot(prices$time, prices$volumeto)
```

# Correlation
```{r}
cor(unlist(prices$open), unlist(prices$close))
cor(as.numeric(prices$volumeto), as.numeric(prices$close))
cor(as.numeric(prices$volumefrom), as.numeric(prices$close))
cor(as.numeric(prices$volumeto), as.numeric(prices$volumefrom))
```

# OHLC
```{r}
matplot(prices[2:5])
```
# FFT
```{r}
 matplot(fft(abs(unlist(prices$close)))
```
